dealing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the activity of buying, selling, or doing business with people
dealing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the job or activity of buying and selling stocks, shares, foreign currencies etc on a financial market
dealing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: After the first hour of dealing, the FTSE had slipped 10.1 to 3025.3.
Share dealings in the new issue will begin on Dec. 8.
a full range of currency dealing services
dealing.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the business relationships or activities that you have become involved in
dealing.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The secret dealings of his department were made public.
Anyone who has had dealings with an insurance company knows how long it takes for payment to be made.
